name: Choice of the Vampire
description:
Begin your two-hundred-year journey as a vampire in New Orleans, 1815; choose whether you will seek love, power or redemption as you negotiate the growing-pains of the young Republic.

Choice of the Vampire is a 200,000 word interactive fantasy novel by Jason Stevan Hill, where your choices control the story. It's entirely text-based—without graphics or sound effects—and fueled by the vast, unstoppable power of your imagination.
